prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a mysterious aura and a unique hollow body.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that can disguise itself using its environment.
Show me a Pokemon that has a haunting appearance and can blend into shadows.
Design a creature that represents the spirit of nature with an ethereal glow.
Make a Pokemon that is inspired by a deserted shell, conveying a sense of solitude.
Generate a ghostly figure that floats effortlessly with a translucent body.
Give me a Pokemon with a shell-like exterior and a hauntingly beautiful presence.
